entry.title: Choice - Chunk Light Skipjack Tuna In Water - 1.88 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Choice
Type: FOOD
Price: 15.99

Look no further than this chunk tuna for light and refreshing meal ideas..!

Great for preparing a variety of menu items, you can't go wrong with the excellent quality and value of this canned tuna. Stock up on this chunk light tuna so you always have the ocean-fresh taste of delicious seafood on hand when you need it most!

Quick and Easy Preparation

Canned to maintain texture and freshness, this tuna is conveniently chopped into chunks so you can start preparing your most popular recipes. Use tuna to top signature salads or prepare classic recipes like tuna melts, tuna salad sandwiches, and tuna casseroles. For catered events, serve this light and flaky tuna as a tasty topping for buttery crackers, or use it in a dip for pita bread!

Savory Seafood Flavor

With a savory seafood flavor, these hearty tuna chunks are rich in protein and satisfying taste. Lower in fat and cholesterol than beef or chicken, tuna is a great alternative to standard lunch options and salad bar toppings. Versatile and convenient, this canned tuna will enhance your recipes in an endless number of ways!

entry.title: Grace - Chicken Vienna Sausages In Chicken Broth - 113 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grace
Type: FOOD
Price: 1.99

Product Description
A ready-to-eat snack, Grace Vienna Sausages come in an easy-open pull-top can and are made in our own ISO 9000 certified facility for superior quality.

Ingredients
Mechanically separated chicken, chicken broth, water, salt, corn syrup, spices, granulated garlic, sodium erythorbate and sodium nitrite.

entry.title: Clover Leaf - Pink Salmon - 213 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Clover Leaf
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.49

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Clover Leaf WILD PACIFIC Pink Salmon has a lighter pink colour and has a milder flavour than Sockeye.

Our Pink Salmon is packed solid style i.e. one large piece, and in its own juices for natural goodness.

Clover Leaf Pink Salmon is certified by the Marine Stewardship Council, meaning our salmon is sourced from MSC certified sustainable fisheries that have been certified to the MSC Fisheries Standard, a science-based set of requirements for sustainable fishing. Look for the blue fish MSC logo on our label.
Offering great value, Clover Leaf Pink Salmon is perfect in salads, sandwiches, casseroles, or spreads.

INGREDIENTS
Wild Pink Salmon, salt
HEALTH BENEFITS
- Low in saturated fats
- free of trans fat
- source of omega-3 polyunsaturates
- good source of protein
- good source of calcium & potassium
- source of iron
- excellent source of selenium & vitamin D

106g, 213g, 418g
84

entry.title: Clover Leaf - Crab Meat With 15% Leg Meat - 120 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Clover Leaf
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.49

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:
Clover Leaf Crabmeat with 15% Leg meat is a new addition to our crabmeat line up. This product has the distinctive mildly sweet taste of premium crab leg meat.
Our Crabmeat with 15% Leg meat is low in fat, free of saturated and trans fat, and is a good source of protein.
Clover Leaf Crabmeat with 15% Leg meat is superb for sandwiches, dips and appetizers.
INGREDIENTS:
Crabmeat, water, salt, citric acid, calcium disodium EDTA, sodium phosphate, sulphites.
Contains: Crab, Sulphite.

entry.title: Hereford - Corned Beef - 340 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hereford
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.49

Gluten Free. HEREFORD corned beef, a tradition since 1929.

You know the really nice thing about HEREFORD corned beef is its versatility – all the different and easy ways you can serve this great tasting premium quality Corned Beef. Recipe suggestions like Corned Beef Quiche, Corned Beef Tacos, Corned Beef Soup, Corned Beef Salad, or a Corned Beef Sandwich. The HEREFORD name guarantees real Corned Beef flavour. There are good reasons for this consistent HEREFORD quality: our careful selection of lean meats, our exclusive preparation formula, our strict processing controls and our standards of excellence that generations of Canadians have known and trusted.

entry.title: Simmenthal - Ready To Eat Beef In Jelly - 3 x 90 g / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Simmenthal
Type: FOOD
Price: 9.99

Launched in Milan in 1923, Simmenthal has been synonymous with canned meat for 90 years.  Its distinct flavour is provided by the delicious combination of premium quality beef, vegetable gelatin and a few drops of honey in every can. Simmenthal is a landmark brand, loved by Italian generations for almost a century. Simmenthal is healthy and nutritious and suitable for everyone. Try it in hot dishes where the gelatin, melting, helps to flavor the dish, or in cold recipes where it preserves all its freshness... and for a delicious summer dish try the cold fridge!

entry.title: Rio Mare - Insalatissime Couscous And Light Tuna Salad - 160 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rio Mare
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.29

Rio Mare Insalatissime Cous Cous and Light Tuna is a ready to eat tuna salad the whole family can enjoy with delicious, and fresh tasting ingredients like chickpeas, carrots, peas, peppers and cherry tomatoes - it is a great option for snacking or for a convenient meal on-the-go.
  • The Cous cous alternative is ideal for those who love the sweet and exotic flavour of cous cous embellished with delicious tuna and appetising vegetables
  • 16g of protein per can
  • No Preservatives
  • Cooking Tip: Try it on top of grilled aubergines garnished with oil and parsley
  • Visit riomare.ca and be inspired! Find great tasting recipes the whole family can enjoy

entry.title: Rio Mare - Solid Light Tuna In Olive Oil - 6 x (4 x 80 g)/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rio Mare
Type: FOOD
Price: 59.99

Canned with the sole addition of olive oil and a pinch of salt, Rio Mare Tuna in Olive Oil is a classic Rio Mare product, the main ingredient in the diet of thousands of people in Italy and across the world.
Its extraordinary and immediate success is due to its delicious, unmistakable and unforgettable flavor and its distinctive pink hue. Rio Mare Tuna in Olive Oil’s flavor and perfect balance between firmness and tenderness is unparalleled.
• #1 Tuna in Olive Oil in Canada and in Italy
• 12g of protein per can
• NO Artificial Flavours. Made with REAL ingredients
• Cooking Tip: Ideal in all recipes, from starters to fresh and tantalising salads.
• Visit riomare.ca and be inspired! Find great tasting recipes the whole family can enjoy.

entry.title: Rio Mare Per Pasta - Tuna In Olive Oil With Garlic & Chili Pepper - 160 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rio Mare
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.39

CHARACTERISTICS

A ready-to-use condiment prepared with plenty of delicious Rio Mare tuna combined with the most popular traditional Mediterranean ingredients.

IDEAL FOR

One of the most classic condiments for pasta is combined with tuna to produce an intense and extremely tasty sauce.
COOKING TIP
Try adding 100 grams of cherry tomatoes cut into quarters.

entry.title: Rio Mare - Insalatissime Beans And Light Tuna Salad - 160 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rio Mare
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99

CHARACTERISTICS

The unique flavour of Rio Mare tuna expertly combined with fragrant vegetables and in some varieties, enriched, with tasty cereal. Ready to eat at any time thanks to the stay-fresh packaging that preserves its freshness, flavour and nutritional properties with no added preservatives.

IDEAL FOR

The Tuna and Beans alternative is ideal for those who love traditional flavours because the tenderness of the tuna combines perfectly with the rustic flavour of the beans and the appetising notes of the olives.
COOKING TIP
Try it on a salad of raw spinach and lightly fried bacon.
